entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:24 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 09:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: WSW 23 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow early this morning. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
